text.__SUMMARY__:
Solanum granuloso-leprosum is a species of plant in the family Solanaceae.
It is endemic to Brazil.
text.See also:
List of plants of Atlantic Forest vegetation of Brazil
List of plants of Cerrado vegetation of Brazil
text.References: Carvalho, L.d'A.F. 1998.  Solanum granulosum-leprosum [sic]. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species.   Downloaded on 23 August 2007.
